exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSceneSkin" width="640" height="1140" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="bg_red_png" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
	<e:Image id="score" source="score_png" x="35" y="60" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
	<e:Image id="time" source="time_png" x="466" y="63" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
	<e:Label id="scoreLabel" text="99" x="75" y="90" textColor="0x060000" width="88" fontFamily="Arial" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" height="32"/>
	<e:Label id="timeLabel" width="88" y="86" textColor="0x060000" text="99" fontFamily="Arial" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" x="508" height="33"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="HomeSceneSkin" width="640" height="1140" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="bg_red_png" height="1140" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
	<e:Group height="418" width="640" bottom="28">
		<e:Image source="home-zw-tag_png" x="410" y="230" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
		<e:Image id="zwbg" source="home-zw-blueRing3_png" y="0" x="105" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
		<e:Image id="scan" source="scan_png" width="150" height="50" y="120" x="245" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
		<e:Image id="ring1" source="home-zw-blueRing1_png" width="431" height="428" anchorOffsetX="215.5" anchorOffsetY="214" y="213" x="323" cacheAsBitmap="false"/>
		<e:Image id="ring2" source="home-zw-blueRing2_png" x="322" width="431" height="428" anchorOffsetX="215.5" anchorOffsetY="214" y="212" cacheAsBitmap="false"/>
		<e:Image id="ring3" source="home-zw-greenRing_png" x="322" width="431" height="428" anchorOffsetX="215.5" anchorOffsetY="214" y="211" cacheAsBitmap="false"/>
		<e:Image id="ring4" source="home-zw-pinkRing_png" width="431" height="428" x="320" anchorOffsetX="215.5" anchorOffsetY="214" y="213" cacheAsBitmap="false"/>
		<e:Image id="ring5" source="home-zw-text_png" x="314" anchorOffsetX="221.5" anchorOffsetY="214" y="209" cacheAsBitmap="false"/>
		<e:Image id="zw" source="home-zw_png" y="3" x="104" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group height="338" width="640" top="206">
		<e:Image id="figure1" source="home-Figure_png" x="466" width="271" height="285" anchorOffsetX="135.5" anchorOffsetY="142.5" y="-5" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
		<e:Image id="figure2" source="home-Figure3_png" x="456" anchorOffsetX="98" anchorOffsetY="152" y="18" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
		<e:Image id="figure3" source="home-Figure4_png" x="498" anchorOffsetX="96.5" anchorOffsetY="145.5" y="27" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
		<e:Image id="figure4" source="home-Figure2_png" x="509" anchorOffsetX="141" anchorOffsetY="129" y="17" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
		<e:Image id="title" source="home-title2_png" x="19" y="74" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="IntroduceSceneSkin" width="640" height="1140" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="bg_black_png" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
	<e:Image id="bg3" source="count_png" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
	<e:Image id="bg2" source="count-2_png" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
	<e:Image id="bg1" source="count-3_png" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
	<e:Image id="hand" source="hand_png" x="50" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LoseSceneSkin" width="640" height="1140" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="bg_black_png" cacheAsBitmap="false"/>
	<e:Image source="result-bg_png" cacheAsBitmap="false"/>
	<e:Image id="linkBtn" source="result-btn-1_png" y="682" x="218" cacheAsBitmap="false"/>
	<e:Image id="againBtn" source="result-btn-2_png" y="782" horizontalCenter="0.5" cacheAsBitmap="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LoadingUISkin" width="640" height="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="pill0" source="loading-pill1_png" y="14" x="154"/>
	<e:Image id="pill1" source="loading-pill1_png" y="14" x="225"/>
	<e:Image id="pill2" source="loading-pill1_png" y="14" x="302"/>
	<e:Image id="eat0" source="loading-eat_png" y="8" x="370"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PreloadSkin" width="640" height="1140" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="bg_red_png" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
	<ns1:LoadingUI id="loadingUI" skinName="LoadingUISkin" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="FigureSceneSkin" width="640" height="1140" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="bg_blue_png" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
	<e:Group id="total" height="952" width="640" x="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Image source="judge-bg_png" y="-28" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
		<e:Group id="title" height="88" width="640" x="0" y="37" cacheAsBitmap="true">
			<e:Image source="roles-text-4_png" y="-20" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="content" height="706" width="640" x="0" y="108">
			<e:Image id="figure" source="roles4_png" x="184" y="60" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
			<e:Image id="fabinglv" source="morbidity_png" x="408" y="53" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
			<e:Image id="chuanran" source="infect_png" x="388" y="236" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
			<e:Image id="cet" source="ring-3_png" x="50" y="8" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
			<e:Image id="ring1" source="ring-2_png" x="109" y="65" anchorOffsetX="55.5" anchorOffsetY="55.5" cacheAsBitmap="false"/>
			<e:Image id="ring2" source="ring-1_png" x="108" y="65" anchorOffsetX="55.5" anchorOffsetY="55.5" cacheAsBitmap="false"/>
			<e:Image id="role_text" source="roles-text2-4_png" x="-3" y="572" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group height="200" width="640" x="0" y="808">
			<e:Image id="okBtn" source="btn-left_png" x="63" y="28" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
			<e:Image id="noBtn" source="btn-right_png" x="342" y="28" cacheAsBitmap="true"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="WinSceneSkin" width="640" height="1140" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="bg_red_png" cacheAsBitmap="false"/>
	<e:Image source="red-bg-2_png" x="49" cacheAsBitmap="false"/>
	<e:Image id="shareBtn" source="redBtn-1_png" x="138" y="700" cacheAsBitmap="false"/>
	<e:Image id="againBtn" source="redBtn-2_png" x="352" y="699" cacheAsBitmap="false"/>
	<e:Label text="考前不紧张，分数duang duang duang！" y="208" width="484" textColor="0x040000" size="25" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" x="78" height="50"/>
	<e:Label y="257" textColor="0x040000" size="40" text="你吃下了     颗安神丸，初步治愈夜长噩梦多！" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" width="484" height="152" x="74"/>
	<e:Label id="scoreLabel" y="258" height="45" text="999" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" width="103" size="40" x="222" textColor="0xF30808"/>
	<e:Rect id="shareBg" height="1140" width="640" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.74" cacheAsBitmap="false"/>
	<e:Image id="shareHand" source="share_png" x="321" y="6" cacheAsBitmap="false"/>
</e:Skin>
